short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The first Addiction management extension for Chrome, every day is a new step: keep track of it with Aurelius

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aurelius is a dedicated time tracking app designed to support individuals on their journey to overcome addiction. This intuitive and user-friendly application empowers users to monitor their progress, celebrate milestones, and stay motivated in their recovery journey.
